Package com.google.android.apps.common.testing.testrunner

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActivityLifecycleCallback
    Callback for monitoring activity lifecycle events.
    ActivityLifecycleMonitor
    Interface for tests to use when they need to query the activity lifecycle state.
    UsageTracker
    Used by test infrastructure to report usage stats (optionally).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivityLifecycleMonitorImpl  
    ActivityLifecycleMonitorRegistry
    An exposed registry instance to make it easy for callers to find the lifecycle monitor for their application.
    AnalyticsBasedUsageTracker
    Creates a usage tracker that pings google analytics when infra bits get used.
    AnalyticsBasedUsageTracker.Builder  
    ExposedInstrumentationApi
    Pass-thru class to the ITR defined in android.jar on the device.
    GoogleInstrumentation
    An instrumentation that enables several advanced features and makes some hard guarantees about the state of the application under instrumentation.
    GoogleInstrumentationTestRunner
    Custom instrumentation runner for google android test cases.
    InstrumentationRegistry
    Holds a reference to the instrumentation running the JVM.
    UsageTracker.NoOpUsageTracker
    NoOp implementation.
    UsageTrackerRegistry
    A registry to hold the global UsageTracker.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Stage
    An enumeration of the lifecycle stages an activity undergoes.
